posts.post_content:
That's quite a suicide-elated fellow.   
This card would be much more interesting if it had 5 toughness by itself (while in return shrinking power of course).  
Anyways, that's both an interesting [Timmy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Timmy) and [Johnny](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Johnny) effect.  
Enchant this guy with [Pemmin's Aura](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pemmin's Aura) and go nuts. Or give him lifelink for even more fun.
